name: ai-assistant-platform
description: AI Assistant Platform - Create, configure, and deploy WhatsApp AI Assistants

scripts.deploy:dev: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npm run deploy:dev --workspaces --if-present
scripts.deploy:auth: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=@ai-platform/auth
scripts.deploy:assistant-api: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=@ai-platform/assistant-api
scripts.deploy:data-connectors: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=@ai-platform/data-connectors
scripts.deploy:conversation-engine: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=@ai-platform/conversation-engine
scripts.deploy:cost-tracking: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=@ai-platform/cost-tracking
scripts.deploy:webhook: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=@ai-platform/webhook
